info.title: Customer and Supplier Industry - Read
info.description: The service enables you to retrieve customer/supplier industry master data. You can read information like key and text in the respective language.

x-sap-shortText: Read industry master data using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: SAP Analytics Cloud for Planning Integration(SAP_COM_0087)
[Import Connection setup with SAP Analytics Cloud(1YB)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1YB " Link To BP ")

get.summary: Reads the items of all supplier industries.
get.description: Reads the available customer and supplier industries in your system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

parameters.name: Industry
parameters.description: Customer Supplier Industry

get.summary: Reads the texts of all customer and supplier industries.
get.description: Reads the texts and related fields from all customer and supplier industries. The related fields include the language and ID.
